title: Vaccination Panel: "65% of vaccinated children develop significant physical and mental illnesses, deficiencies and disabilities whereas only 1% of non-vaccinated children develop these."
cleaned_text:
Vaccination Panel: “65% of vaccinated children develop significant physical and mental illnesses, deficiencies and disabilities whereas only 1% of non-vaccinated children develop these.”

VANCOUVER, BC – A scientific evidence-based Panel on Vaccinations has found that “65% of vaccinated children develop significant physical and mental illnesses, deficiencies and disabilities whereas only 1% of non-vaccinated children develop these.”

In this landmark video Panel on Vaccinations, you will learn that The Control Group, led by Joy Garner, intend to use these scientific findings, based on replicable, protocol-based forensic evidence and data, in appropriate U.S. Courts to obtain Court-based legal injunctive and permanent bans on the mandatory use of vaccines as injurious to individual and public health.

The members of the Panel include:

We Do Not Consent to Vaccines http://youtu.be/Cp-3hiy_E_M

Vaccination Panel: “65% of vaccinated children develop significant physical and mental illnesses, deficiencies and disabilities whereas only 1% of non-vaccinated children develop these.”

Tracy Wolf, HPV Vaccine Expert, by necessity since her teen had severe and varied injuries from HPV vaccine

VIDEO – EXPERT PANEL: Forced Adult vaccinations are component of extermination program. Refuse all vaccines

The views expressed by guests are their own.
